name: CyPolice Agent - Miyu
text: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can add 1 "CyPolice Partner" monster from your Deck to your hand. If this card is used as material for the Link Summon of "CyPolice MechAgent - Miyu Mk. II": You can draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "CyPolice Agent - Miyu" once per turn.
